posts.post_content:
Hi folks,

New poster on this forum.  I actively post on Sportscardforum and Hobbyinsider under the same username.  

I won't say how. But I found a gentleman advertising A LOT of vintage 1909 and 1910 cards online. I found the gentleman, offered him cash, and now have well over one thousand cards, most of which are in very good (my terminology) condition.

There's no baseball cards. But there are track and field, boxing, military, animals, cowboys and indians, flags, etc. There is more stuff than I can wrap my brain around.

I've cataloged the sets; and the list below is what I came up with (with the exception of a few randoms I can't pinpoint).  I know this forum is for sports cards --- so I bolded the sportscard sets below.  I think I got all of em!  

If you'd like to see scans and/or know how many I have from each set, just let me know. Any information you can provide is appreciated. Some scans are located here ---http://www.sportscardforum.com/showthread.php?t=1629399 . My apologies if you don't like links to other boards.  If it's a problem, I can add in scans here.

I'm very excited about the find. And it has already generated some interest from a few prospective set buyers. 

1904 J3 Arm & Hammer Game Bird Series
1909 T29 Animal Series
1909 T59 Hustler Flags of all Nations
1909 T59 Recruit Flags of all Nations No. 25, No. 593, No. 229, No. 240, No. 606
1909 T59 Sweet Caporal Little Cigars
1909 T81 Military Series
1910 Duke of York
1910 E3 Navy Caramels
1910 Helmar Turkish Coat of Arms
1910 Scrap Iron Black Back Flags of all Nations
1910 Sub Rossa Types of Nations Series
1910 T18 World's Greatest Explorers
1910 T218 Hassan Athletes Series
1910 T218 Mecca Athletes
1910 T220 Mecca Athletes
1910 T223 Athletes
1910 T225 Prizefighter Series
1910 T28 Milo Cigarettes Aeroplane
1910 T59 Flags of All Nations
1910 T59 Red Scrap Iron Flags of all Nations
1910 T68 Heroes of History
1910 T73 Hassan Indian Life in the 60s
1910 T79 Military Series
1910-11 T42 Sweet Caporale
1911 T69 Historic Houses Series
1920s Dockman Flag Chewing Gum
1927 John Players and Sons Game Birds and Wild Fowl
1935 Churchmans Rugby International
1935 John Player and Sons Sea Fishes
1936 John Player and Sons International Airlines
Old Mill Bird Series
Recruit Nations Series
Sweet Caporal Fish Series
T113 Recruit Types of Nations Series
T113 Types of Nations
T230 Man Handle Scrap
T30 Hassan Artic Scenes
T39 Battleships - Burley Cubs and Sweet Briar
T57 Turkish Trophies Fable Series
T58 Piedmont Fish

No feedback in this thread.  But plenty of emails and quick sales.  :p

If anyone is interested in any of these sets, let me know.  That is, with the exception of the boxing cards.  Thank you.
what track and field do you have in this series
